resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107778</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107778</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203546</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">John Travoltage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">John Travoltage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">John Travoltage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">John Travoltage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">John Travoltage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ιοχν Travoltage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juan Travoltage</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Make sparks fly with John Travoltage. Wiggle Johnnie's foot and he picks up charges from the carpet. Bring his hand close to the door knob and get rid of the excess charge.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lassen Sie Funken mit John Travoltage fliegen. 
Wiggle Fuß Johnnies und er hebt Ladungen vom Teppich auf. 
Holen Sie seine Hand nah an dem Türdrehknopf und werden Sie die
überschüssige Ladung los.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faites les étincelles voler avec John Travoltage.
Agitez le pied de Johnnie et il prend des frais du tapis. 
Apportez sa main près de la molette de porte et 
débarassez-vous de la charge excessive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça faíscas voar com John Travoltage. 
Wiggle o pé de Johnnie e escolhe acima cargas do tapete. 
Traga sua mão perto do botão da porta e comece-a livrado da 
carga adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Faccia le scintille volare con John Travoltage. 
Wiggle il piede del Johnnie e prende le spese dalla moquette. 
Porti la sua mano vicino alla manopola del portello ed elimini 
la carica eccedente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάνετε τους σπινθήρες να πετάξουν με John 
Travoltage. Πόδι Johnnie Wiggle και παίρνει τις 
δαπάνες από τον τάπητα. Φέρτε το χέρι του κοντά στο 
εξόγκωμα πορτών και ξεφορτωθείτε την υπερβολική δαπάνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haga que las chispas vuelan con Juan Travoltage. 
Menee el pie de Johnnie y él toma cargas de la alfombra. 
Traiga su mano cerca de la perilla de la puerta y consiga 
librado de exceso de la carga.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203546</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107778</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/john-travoltage</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
